meanings.definition: A person who practices Rolfing, a form of alternative medicine involving physical manipulation of the body's connective tissues.
meanings.sent1: The rolfer helped me feel better by working on my muscles.
meanings.sent2: I scheduled an appointment with the rolfer to address my back pain.
meanings.sent3: The rolfer joked that he could 'un-knot' my muscles like a magician.
meanings.sent4: The rolfer's hands were like skilled artists sculpting my body.
meanings.sent5: After the rolfer's session, I felt like a new person with improved flexibility.

meanings.definition: To undergo Rolfing therapy to improve posture and alleviate pain.
meanings.sent1: I decided to rolfer my back to relieve the tension.
meanings.sent2: She will rolfer her shoulders to correct her posture.
meanings.sent3: We should rolfer our bodies regularly to stay healthy and pain-free.
meanings.sent4: Rolfing can rolfer your body into better alignment over time.
meanings.sent5: After I rolfered, I felt more relaxed and upright in my stance.
